full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO SPYANG GI MGO CAN CHE'I BSANGS MCHOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES PA 'DI NI SPYAN GYIS GNOD CHEN LA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD LA BYAMS PA SNYING RJE SEMS SKYED MAH'A LA SPRUL SKU GSUM SHES RING PO CHES BLA MA BSKUL BA'I NGOR, AER TE NI CHOS RJES BDUN GYIS SHIS SPRUL SKU LCAM SRING ZHAL GZIMS BYUNG BLA MAS 'GRO PHYUGS LA CI SPYAN GYIS KHRO BO CHOS GDON ZHI 'DON LA SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR BGYI SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
